smokeRemoval.title: Smoke Control System Calculator
smokeRemoval.velocityNonCompliant: velocity does not comply with standards (0.5-2.0 m/s)
smokeRemoval.geometryNonCompliant: corridor geometry does not meet minimum requirements
smokeRemoval.heightCompliant: smoke-free layer height complies with standards
smokeRemoval.heightNonCompliant: smoke-free layer height below minimum (2.0 m)
smokeRemoval.perimeterNonCompliant: fire perimeter outside standard range (2-50 m)
smokeRemoval.errorMessage: Please enter correct data for calculation.
smokeRemoval.saveMessage: Smoke control system calculation: Required smoke exhaust L = {{result}} m³/h.
smokeRemoval.standardsNote: Calculation complies with Ukrainian DBN V.1.1-7:2016 'Fire safety of construction objects' and DSTU 8828:2019
